content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you considering for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I'm a student and I'm on a budget. I was thinking about 500 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's far below my expectations. The location and quality of the apartment warrant a higher price. Would you be willing to consider a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can consider a higher offer. What did you have in mind?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment. How about 800 Euro per month? It's a fair price for the amenities and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, 800 Euro is quite a lot for me. I'm willing to pay more, but I need to stay within my budget. How about 650 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 650 Euro is still below what I'm looking for. The apartment is brand new and in a prime location. I'm sure you understand that I must get a price that reflects its worth. How about 750 Euro? It's a reasonable compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 Euro is a better offer, but I still think it's a bit high for me. How about we meet in the middle at 700 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 700 Euro is closer to what I'm seeking, but it's still not quite there. I'm willing to be flexible, though. How about 725 Euro per month? This is a very good deal for you, considering the standards of living in München.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 725 Euro per month sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 725 Euro per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Welcome to München, Maryam! I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay in the city. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
